main.name: Srikar Kusumanchi
main.description: 15x Hackathon Winner, Recognized by Google Cloud and Wolfram Alpha
main.bio: A self-taught programmer with knowledge in many languages/frameworks such as Python, React Native, and JavaScript. Freelanced for two years creating web and mobile apps that have the common purpose of helping the public. Created applications that solve real-world problems in this era of digital transformation, such as widlifire awareness app and homework helper app. I have a deep passion for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Web/Mobile development. Additionally, I have created many clones of big tech sites using React such as a Facebook Clone, Netflix Clone, Discord Clone, and more.
main.contactmessage: Love my work? Get in touch with me!

work.title: Research Project Lead
work.description: Surpassed industry standards with a model for fundus image feature extraction, achieving 96 percent accuracy and surpassing industry benchmarks by 11%. Developed a fundus image anomaly detection system to optimize image quality and streamline clinical workflows. Co-developed an AI cup-to-disc ratio (CDR) pipeline to mitigate subjectivity in diagnoses. Presented research findings at ARVO ophthalmology conference.

work.title: Lead Application Developer
work.description: Lead the development of Spectra to help diagnose neurological disorders with eye saccades. Generated oculometrics matching clinical standards. Created an API with a 1-2Â° error for business eye-tracking solutions like adtech, education, gaming, and robotics.

work.company: Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard
work.title: Research Intern
work.description: Created a statistical analysis algorithm with 94.7% accuracy at detecting hallucination-like behavior to devise new antipsychotic treatments. Developed trackers/visualization for behavioral data: 20+ trials/animal with & without Audio/Visual stimulus. Implemented rsFC correlation analysis across 80 brain regions, generating statistical visualizations with p-value thresholding to map neural-ocular response patterns.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Created automated Slack monitoring bot using Slack API and AWS EC2, reducing on-call response time by 75% across 25+ production websites. Implemented machine learning models for website analytics using Python and scikit-learn, generating insights for business stakeholders. Enhanced user experience through responsive web optimization, increasing mobile conversion rates by 23%.
